title: Winner, Google GenAI Hackathon 2024
description: Secured first place in the BigBasket track against over 1,000 participants in a national-level hackathon.

title: MITACS Globalink Research Intern
description: Awarded the prestigious research internship with a <15% acceptance rate among thousands of international applicants.

title: Global Web3 Hackathon Winner
description: Won prizes at multiple international Web3 hackathons, including ETHIndia 2022 & 2023, ETHForAll 2023, and FVM Spacewarp 2023.

title: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador & President
